    åº”è¯¥ä»…å¯¹ç¨‹åºä¸­é¢‘ç¹å˜åŒ–çš„é‚£éƒ¨åˆ†åšå‡ºæŠ½è±¡ï¼Œç„¶è€Œï¼Œå¯¹äºåº”ç”¨ç¨‹åºä¸­æ¯ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†éƒ½åˆ»æ„çš„æŠ½è±¡ä¹Ÿä¸æ˜¯ä¸ªå¥½ä¸»æ„ã€‚æ‹’ç»ä¸æˆç†ŸæŠ½è±¡å’ŒæŠ½è±¡æœ¬èº«åŒæ ·é‡è¦ã€‚

    A.é«˜å±‚æ¨¡å—ä¸åº”è¯¥ä¾èµ–ä½å±‚æ¨¡å—ã€‚ä¸¤ä¸ªéƒ½åº”è¯¥ä¾èµ–æŠ½è±¡ã€‚

#include "stdio.h"
int main() {
    char s[]="****A*BC*DEF*G*****",*t=s;
    int i,j;
    while(*t) {
        t++;
    }
    t--;
    while(*t=='*') {
        t--;
    }
    for(i=0,j=0; &s[i]!=t; i++) {
        if(s[i]!='*')
            s[j++]=s[i];
    }
    while(*t) {
        s[j++]=*t++;
    }
    s[j]='\0';
    puts(s);
    return 0;
}

#include "stdio.h"
int main() {
    char s[]="****A*BC*DEF*G*****",*t=s;
    int i,j;
    while(*++t);
    while(*--t=='*');
    for(i=0,j=0; &s[i]!=t; i++) {
        if(s[i]!='*') s[j++]=s[i];
    }
    while(*t) {
        s[j++]=*t++;
    }
    s[j]='\0';
    puts(s);
    return 0;
}

int insertsort(int a[],int n) {
    int bottom,mid,top,temp,i,j;
    for(i=1; i<n; i++) {
        //bottomå€¼ä¸º0,topå€¼ä¸ºè¢«æ’åºå€¼å‰ä¸€ä½
        bottom=0;

        while(bottom<=top) {

                top=mid-1;

        //å½“å‰midä¸ºæœ€æ¥è¿‘è¢«æ’åºå€¼çš„ä½ï¼Œå¦‚æœè¢«æ’åºå€¼å¤§äºmidã€‚åˆ™mid++

#include<stdio.h>
char *strstr (char *str1,char *str2) {
    char *cp = str1;
    char *s1, *s2;
    if ( !*str2 )
        return(str1);
    while (*cp) {
        s1 = cp;
        s2 = str2;
        while ( *s1 && *s2 && !(*s1-*s2) )
            s1++, s2++;
        if (!*s2)
            return(cp);
        cp++;
    }
    return(NULL);
}

#include<stdio.h>

int converse(int n)
{
    int i=0;
    char a[20],b[]="0123456789ABCDEF";

        a[i++]=b[n%16];
        n=n/16;
    }

}

#include<stdio.h>
int find(int n[],int x,int low,int high) {
    if(high>=low) {
        int mid = (low + high)/2;
        if(x>n[mid])
            return find(n,x,mid+1,high);
        else if(x<n[mid])
            return find(n,x,low,mid-1);
        else
            return 1;
    } else {
        return 0;
    }
}
int main() {
    int a[]= {1,2,4,5,8,9,10};
    printf("%d",find(a,8,0,6));
    return 0;
}
